bioconda.name: gcta
bioconda.summary: GCTA (Genome-wide Complex Trait Analysis) estimates the proportion of phenotypic variance explained by all genome-wide SNPs for complex traits.

biocontainers.name: gcta
biocontainers.summary: A tool for genome-wide complex trait analysis

biotools.summary: Genome-wide Complex Trait Analysis. Estimate the proportion of phenotypic variance explained by genome- or chromosome-wide SNPs for complex traits (the GREML method), and has subsequently extended for many other analyses to better understand the genetic architecture of complex traits.

bioschemas.name: GCTA
bioschemas.summary: Genome-wide Complex Trait Analysis. Estimate the proportion of phenotypic variance explained by genome- or chromosome-wide SNPs for complex traits (the GREML method), and has subsequently extended for many other analyses to better understand the genetic architecture of complex traits.
